title: Returns from space
creator_credit: United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration
brief_description: Some of the varied “Spinoff” benefits and products of space research and development are demonstrated. These include use of sensors for monitoring hospital patients, devices which aid the disabled, the uses of freeze-dried foods for campers, new technological tools and materials, and microminiaturisation of electronic components.
